relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

name: Material Exchange Format (MXF) -- MXF Generic Container
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">other</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: The native essence container for the MXF file format that carries video, audio, metadata and other 'payloads,' i.e., bitstreams called essences in the audio-visual community.  The container is described as 'streamable,' meaning that its audio-visual content can be 'continuously decoded through mechanisms such as interleaving essence components with stream-based metadata.'
